info.name: wsirc darker
info.description: Dark theme for wsirc.com. As of june 2015, wsirc is beta in transition, so don't know how long this will work. At the time of writing this, the theme isn't too beautiful but sets a darker colorscheme for wsirc, so readability is improved at night.
info.additionalInfo: Probably, code appears a bit messy, as I compiled it using LESS, i.e. the CSS is just output, not the actual source.
